sources.title: No Place Like Homicide!
sources.description: Title: No Place Like Homicide! Summary: Ernie's uncle Gabriel has just died but to claim his inheritance he must spend the night in the ancestral home with the rest of his relatives. Before long the guests begin to drop dead. Directed by: Pat Jackson Actors: Sidney James, Kenneth Connor, Shirley Eaton Production Company: New World Films Ltd. Release Date: 15 September 1961 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 Ernie's uncle Gabriel has just died but to claim his inheritance he must spend the night in the ancestral home with the rest of his relatives. Before long the guests begin to drop dead.
